It might surprise you to know that these 19 beaches are one of the most scenic in India, especially (Read More) the beaches of Diu that can be compared to those of Goa. If you're ever looking for a beach getaway from Ahmedabad, or any city in Gujarat for that matter, be sure to check out this list of coastal havens with their picturesque and alluring shorelines. Here is the list of 19 Best Beaches near Ahmedabad For the Perfect Coastal Escape 1. Mandvi Beach, Bhuj 4.5 /5 View 5+ photos Mandvi beach in Bhuj is one of the best beaches near Ahmedabad with a pristine and tranquil seashore. It is endowed with a calm and clean environment and makes for a peaceful getaway from the city. The silky smooth sand of Mandvi Beach is an inviting carpet which gives way to the salty waters of the Arabian Sea. You can enjoy the serene beauty of this place with your friends and family, or go all out and explore the windmills that are situated here as well. Distance from Ahmedabad: 388 km Read More 2. Somnath Beach, Somnath 4.3 /5 View 6+ photos Along with the world-famous Somnath Temple, the Somnath Beach near Ahmedabad forms an important part of the itinerary of a tourist visiting Gujarat. It is famous for its beautifully sparkling waves and long stretches of grey sands. Travellers can unwind here after a long day of sightseeing, although, swimming is not recommended. One can also find many joggers running along a path in early mornings and evenings. Sunsets are particularly beautiful and add a romantic touch to the end of a great day. Distance from Ahmedabad: 414 km Read More 3. Dumas Beach, Surat 4.2 /5 Dumas beach is a very popular beach destination near Ahmedabad, situated at a distance of 18 km from Surat city. Travellers recommend this destination for its calming effect and picturesque scenery. Distance from Ahmedabad: 281 km Read More 4. Dwarka Beach, Dwarka 4.6 /5 Along the Arabian Sea coast, Dwarka Beach is a good place to relax in the evenings. A popular beach destination near Ahmedabad, Dwarka Beach is located quite close to the main temples in the holy town of Dwarka. Ghogla Beach, Diu 3.6 /5 A golden sand beach near Ahmedabad, Ghogla Beach undulates into the horizon while the Arabian Sea laps away at the edge as though imploring the sands to let it find its own beach. Distance from Ahmedabad: 352 km Read More 6. Sarkheswar Beach, Junagadh 3.1 /5 Sarkeshwar Beach is one good beach near Ahmedabad to relax and enjoy the coastal vibes. Sound of the waves here are very soothing and the shore is lined by tiny and beautiful sea shells. Distance from Ahmedabad: 338 km Read More 7. Dandi, Surat 4.3 /5 Dandi is a popular destination of tourists visiting Surat. Dandi is a place famous in the history of Indian independence movement and has an extremely important significance in the history of our country. Distance from Ahmedabad: 276 km Read More 8. Beyt Island, Dwarka Located around 30 km from the main town of Dwarka, Beyt Dwarka is a small island and was the main port in the region before the development of Okha. While the island is enclosed by a few temples, white sand beach and coral reefs, this beach near Ahmedabad is also popular among tourists for its marine life, sea excursions, camping and picnics. Distance from Ahmedabad: 465 km Read More 9. Miyani Beach, Porbandar 3.1 /5 One among the undeveloped and virgin beaches near Ahmedabad, Miyani Beach gives a splendid experience. Located at a distance of 36 km from Porbandar, one can also enjoy other tourist attractions like the Sudama temple, Kirti temple, Harsidhhi temple and Brahma temple, all situated close to this scenic beach. Distance from Ahmedabad: 435 km Read More 10. Devka Beach, Daman 3.5 /5 Devka beach is a sight of pure beauty. Like so many other Daman beaches near Ahmedabad, this too is a massive, picturesque and quite unspoilt. Distance from Ahmedabad: 365 km Read More 11. Nagoa Beach, Diu 4.2 /5 View 5+ photos Famous for its pristine beauty and swaying palm trees, Nagoa Beach in Diu is an ideal and a recommended place for tourists all over the world. The place is well connected with the resorts, hence it making it easy for the travellers to relax and explore its beauty at the same time. The beach is surrounded by beautiful palm trees swaying in the cool breeze which creates an exotic environment for the travellers to laze around. The serene beauty of the beach due to its white sands and quiet blue water is worth experiencing and enjoying.  Timings : Anytime Time Required : 1-2 hrs Entry Fee : No entry fee Distance from Ahmedabad: 361 km Read More 12. Gomtimata Beach, Diu 3.2 /5 Located on the western end of the Diu in the village Vanakbara, this is one of the best beaches of the region. Secluded and with natural white sand, Gomtimata beach is a beautiful beach near Ahmedabad to just sit back and relax. You will also find a temple located at the beach. Distance from Ahmedabad: 368 km Read More 13. Jallandhar Beach, Diu 3.2 /5 Named after the demon, Jallandar, this sunny beach near Ahmedabad lies almost 1km from the coastal territory Diu and has a temple and a memorial. The temple is dedicated to Goddess Chandrika while the memorial is atop a hill with a stone structure of the demon Jallandar. The beach also offers exciting water sports. Distance from Ahmedabad: 358 km Read More 14. Porbandar Beach, Porbandar 3.1 /5 Also known as Willingdon Marina Beach, Porbandar Beach is one of the famous and most amazing attractions of Porbandar. Don't forget to visit Huzur Palace which is a great tourist spot located near the beach. Distance from Ahmedabad: 401 km Read More 15. Suvali Beach, Surat 4.4 /5 View 6+ photos Suvali Beach, a calm and serene beach, is situated at a distance of 20 km from Surat. It is close to the industrial town, Hajira which is near Surat. Surat is a black sandy beach popular among locals for a picnic. Located amidst industries, it offers a refreshing scenic view. Mostly visited by solitude seekers from the bustling city life of Surat and Ahmedabad, the beach is slowly developing into a tourist spot. Currently, there are not many options for food and drinks. Distance from Ahmedabad: 280 km Read More 16. Jampore Beach, Daman 3.7 /5 Jampore beach is one significant attraction of Daman, and one of the best options for those looking for beaches near Ahmedabad. Situated remotely 5 kilometres away from the Moti Daman Jetty, the beach gets fame because of its blackish mud-coloured water. It is soothing just to have glimpses of the sea and is a perfect place for the ones seeking longing peace and solitude. The beach is away from the hustle of the city and is, therefore, a great place to relax. Covered with trees all over makes the place breezy and gives it an ecstatic look. Distance from Ahmedabad: 371 km Read More 17. Chakratirth Beach, Diu 3.1 /5 Nestled amidst the picturesque hills meeting the Arabian Sea, the Chakratirth beach is the ideal place to soak up the sun or frolick in the enchanting waters while beating the heat and relaxing by the calming shores of Diu. This is one of the most popular beaches of Gujarat, and one of the most visited beached from Ahmedabad and other cities in the State. Distance from Ahmedabad: 360 km Read More 18. Tithal Beach, Surat 4.3 /5 Breaking the flow of the whitewashed waves, the Tithal beach glimmers like a gold necklace that decorates the azure neck of the Arabian Sea. Come the weekend, and the beach is flocked by local tourists that come here to lounge languorously in the sun, stare at the sunsets, take a stroll down the coast in the gentle breeze and enjoy some coconut water and roasted corn. Distance from Ahmedabad: 339 km Read More 19. Nani Daman, Daman Nani Daman or small Daman, as the name suggests, is the smaller of the two parts of the city. The region mainly comprises of several Gothic-style churches, a Lighthouse, the famous Nani Daman fort and an old Jain temple featuring 18th-century glass murals and paintings. The Nani Daman Beach here is quite a refreshing beach to visit while in the area. There is also a local Dubai market that has everything at a very reasonable cost.
